title: 1 Walk And 2 Strikes
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if tonight’s Game 4 vs the Celtics is must win for the Warriors, if the Ranges should still have belief after game 5 loss to go down 3-2 to the Lightning, and is Tony La Russa right to defend internally walking Trae Turner with 2 strikes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Tonight's NBA Finals Game 4 and La Russa's controversial walk.
